means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 克拉克 Clark的变体

sentence.Network_en: A stupid medical clerk had slipped the wrong tab on his X-ray.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个蠢笨的医护人员一不留神在他的X光片上贴错了标签。

sentence.Network_en: "I've come to reclaim my property," she announced to the desk clerk.
sentence.Network_cn: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentence.Network_en: It was strange, how invisible a clerk could feel.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名办事员会感到如此受人忽视，令人觉得不可思议。

jx.jx_en_mean: (in the UK) the sovereign's principal chaplain
an official who assists the judges in horse racing or motor racing
(Brit.)a person who oversees building work in progress

means.word_mean: 公司事务员,职员,办事员

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cleric, clerc (in the sense 'ordained minister, literate person'), from ecclesiastical Latin clericus 'clergyman' (see cleric); reinforced by Old French clerc, from the same source. Sense 1 dates from the early 16th cent

entry.def: A clerk is a person who works in an office, bank, or law court and whose job is to look after the records or accounts.

example.ex: She was offered a job as an accounts clerk with a travel firm.
example.tran: 她得到一份在旅行社当记账员的工作。

entry.def: In a hotel, office, or hospital, a clerk is the person whose job is to answer the telephone and deal with people when they arrive.
A clerk is someone who works in a store.

entry.tran: 做文书工作;当接待员(或店员等)
entry.def: To clerk means to work as a clerk.

example.tran: 吉恩在拍卖会上作文书工作。

example.ex: He clerked for the chief justice of the Supreme Court.
example.tran: 他为最高法院的大法官做书记员。

means.word_mean: 1. an employee who performs clerical work (e.g., keeps records or accounts)
1. work as a clerk, as in the legal business

auth_sentence.content: A city clerk...gets himself convicted of a common embezzlement.
auth_sentence.res_content: A city clerk...gets himself convicted of a common embezzlement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A city clerk...gets himself convicted of a common embezzlement.

auth_sentence.content: Einstein by the way was a lowly patents clerk.
auth_sentence.res_content: Einstein by the way was a lowly patents clerk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Einstein by the way was a lowly patents clerk.

auth_sentence.content: He was reading unusual, a shoe clerk reading.

jushi.english: We have a staff of three photographers and a clerk.
jushi.chinese: 我们全体工作人员有三个摄影师和一个店员组成。

jushi.english: He is a clerk with the firm of Smith Brothers.
jushi.chinese: 他是史密斯兄弟商行的办事员。
